page.title: 15Biography Of Famous Artist
page.content: Nicholas Evans is one of the world's best artists.He was born in Aberdare on 10th of January 1907.He worked as an engine driver for British Rail until his retirement. When he was 71 years of age he was awarded Â£1000 by the Welsh Arts Council.This resulted in his holding 2 one_man exhibitions.He went on to exhibit his paintings in the National Eisteddfod for 9 years running and received prizes for them. His work was discussed on the radio programme "Critic's Forum." The Royal Academy of Arts accepted two of his oil paintings for their 1979 Summer Exhibition. The strange thing is that he never uses colour when painting.His paintings consist of black or dark blue oil paints only.The paintings are described as "velvety"and"iconlike."
